backend/main.mo: Defines user-related types such as Mood, Gender, RelationshipIntent, avatars, and profiles, plus text conversion helpers within an actor canister.
feature_evidence.json: Lists feature evidence records linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten summaries for various frontend files describing their behavior, UI changes, and routing details.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base configuration defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point that loads the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the router, route tree, theme, React Query client, and global providers for the app.
frontend/src/components/app/AppFooter.ts: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/app/AppHeader.ts: Header component with app branding, theme toggle, journal button, and a user dropdown including profile navigation and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/app/AppLayout.ts: Authenticated app layout including header, bottom nav, journal overlay, sound manager, and logout-redirect logic.
frontend/src/components/app/BottomNav.ts: Renders a fixed bottom navigation bar with icons and unread notification badges, updating active state based on the current route.
frontend/src/components/app/FloatingJour: Displays a floating action button for composing a new journal entry when visibility context allows.
frontend/src/components/app/ThemeToggleB: Provides a button to switch between light and dark themes using next-themes.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Wraps protected content, showing a loading state or login panel until Internet Identity authentication is ready.
Shows a themed login screen with randomized messaging, feature highlights, and a button to start Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleEne: Displays a summary of circle energy generated from recent posts using a styled card.
frontend/src/components/circle/CircleMem: Lists circle members with profile details, pulse scores, and controls for removing members.
frontend/src/components/circle/JoinByCod: Form for entering and submitting a share code to request joining a circle, with validation and status feedback.
frontend/src/components/circle/PendingRe: Shows pending join requests with profile info and actions to accept or decline each request.
frontend/src/components/circle/SafePeopl: Manages selection of up to two safe people, showing recommended candidates and handling add/remove actions with backend updates.
frontend/src/components/circle/ShareCode: Renders a card to view, copy, and edit the user’s share code, including validation and API update flow.
frontend/src/components/common/IconActio: Button component that displays an icon with a tooltip wrapper and optional children.
frontend/src/components/common/Progressi: Collapsible section component with a button trigger to reveal additional content.
frontend/src/components/feed/MoodCheckIn: Displays a dismissible reminder prompting the user to complete a daily mood check‑in.
frontend/src/components/feed/SilentSigna: Shows a silent signal entry with mood info, author details, and styled coloring based on mood category.
Lets users send predefined silent signals to their Safe People, with setup checks and send feedback.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalD: Date picker popover for selecting journal entry dates, preventing selection of future dates.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalE: Manages viewing, creating, and deleting journal entries for a chosen date with edit restrictions for past days.
frontend/src/components/journal/JournalO: Full-screen journal panel containing date selection, rules, and the entries panel, resetting to today when opened.
frontend/src/components/profile/MicroAct: Generates and displays micro‑action suggestions based on mood history, with a fallback when insufficient data exists. Renders actions, reasons, and disclaimer messaging.
frontend/src/components/profile/MoodAnal: Analyzes mood history over a selectable timeframe, showing trends, top moods, and concern levels. Integrates MicroActionsPanel and UI for timeframe selection and pattern insights.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileA: Allows users to preview, select, or upload an avatar with validation and preview management. Handles system avatars, file uploads, and notifies parent on changes.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileG: Gates access to profile-dependent content by loading the user profile, handling errors, and triggering onboarding if missing. Shows loading, error recovery, or the wrapped content.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Guides new users through a multi-step onboarding flow to collect profile details, then saves the completed profile. Includes validation, share code generation, and progressive UI prompts.
frontend/src/components/sound/SoundEffec: Monitors notifications, feed, join requests, and circle members to play sounds when new items appear. Tracks previous data and suppresses sounds on initial load.
frontend/src/components/status/AudienceS: UI component for choosing the audience of a status post, including whole circle, specific people, safe people, or private, with member selection handling.
frontend/src/components/status/ContextTa: Tag picker allowing users to select predefined context tags or add custom ones with validation and soft limits.
frontend/src/components/status/MoodPicke: Mood selection component with search, category grouping, and color‑coded mood buttons.
frontend/src/components/status/PostStatu: Dialog prompting users to write a private note with optional micro‑action suggestions based on mood history.
frontend/src/components/status/StatusCar: Displays a user's status post with mood, author info, timestamps, and privacy indicators.
frontend/src/constants/branding.ts: Defines the application's brand name constant.
frontend/src/constants/contextTags.ts: Defines predefined context tags, soft limits, and custom tag length constants.
frontend/src/constants/foundationCopy.ts: Provides core promise and boundary text for the app’s foundational messaging.
frontend/src/constants/loginCopy.ts: Contains rotating login screen copy and a helper for selecting random phrases.
frontend/src/constants/moods.ts: Defines mood options with labels, emojis, and categories for use throughout the app.
frontend/src/constants/sounds.ts: Maps sound cue identifiers to their asset file paths.
frontend/src/constants/systemAvatars.ts: Defines a fixed list of system avatar IDs and paths and provides a helper to retrieve an avatar path by ID.
frontend/src/contexts/FloatingJournalVis: Provides a React context to track and toggle visibility of the floating journal UI.
frontend/src/contexts/JournalOverlayCont: Implements a context for controlling journal overlay open state and reset behavior.
frontend/src/contexts/SoundContext.tsx: Manages global sound settings, audio unlocking, and playback functions for notification-related sounds.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithError.ts: Wraps useActor to expose error state and refetch logic for actor initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Handles Internet Identity auth flow, state, and persistence via a React context provider.
frontend/src/hooks/useJournal.ts: Provides queries and mutations for journal entries using the backend actor with cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useMoodHistory.ts: Builds a user's recent mood history from feed data filtered by timeframe and identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains profile, avatar, feed, and connection-related React Query hooks backed by the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSound.ts: Simple wrapper exposing the SoundContext hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets Tailwind layers and defines extensive light/dark mode CSS variables plus safe-area padding utilities.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/CirclePage.tsx: Renders the Circle dashboard with energy card, members, join options, requests, and safe people tabs.
frontend/src/pages/CirclesImInPage.tsx: Shows a list of circles the user is part of, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ClosestConnectionsPag: Displays ranked closest connections with reasons, handling loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/ComposeStatusPage.tsx: Provides a full status composer with mood, content, audience selection, tags, and posting logic.
frontend/src/pages/DailyCheckInPage.tsx: Implements the daily check‑in flow with mood selection, content, audience controls, and guard enforcement.
frontend/src/pages/FeedPage.tsx: Fetches and displays the user's feed with status updates, silent signals, reminders, and a composer. Handles loading, empty states, and refresh actions.
frontend/src/pages/HomeRoutePage.tsx: Routes users to the public home page or the authenticated feed depending on identity state. Shows a loading screen during identity initialization.
frontend/src/pages/InviteCodeAuthStepPag: Manages invite-code-based authentication flow, including login, editing stored invite codes, and joining a circle. Handles success, errors, and redirects.
frontend/src/pages/NotificationsPage.tsx: Displays unread and read notifications, supports marking notifications (or all) as read, and links to related statuses. Handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/ProfilePage.tsx: Shows and edits the user's profile, including avatar, preferences, and visibility settings. Supports saving updates, uploading/selecting avatars, and displays pulse score.
frontend/src/pages/PublicHomePage.tsx: Public landing page with invite-code entry, onboarding info, and account creation routing. Handles storing invite codes and navigation to authentication.
frontend/src/pages/StartAuthPage.tsx: Provides login/start-auth screen and redirects authenticated users to the home route. Handles login state, errors, and back navigation.
frontend/src/pages/StatusDetailPage.tsx: Displays a single status post, handling loading, errors, permission issues, and navigation back to the feed.
frontend/src/utils/age.ts: Provides helpers to calculate age, format dates for input, and parse date strings into bigint timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/audience.ts: Builds a unique audience list for a post, ensuring the author is always included.
frontend/src/utils/circleEnergy.ts: Analyzes recent status posts to derive sentiment, vibe, and generate abstract circle‑energy summaries.
frontend/src/utils/contextTags.ts: Normalizes and validates custom context tags, checking length and duplicates.
frontend/src/utils/dailyCheckInEntry.ts: Manages a one‑time sessionStorage flag indicating daily check‑in mode entry.
frontend/src/utils/inviteCodeSession.ts: Stores, normalizes, retrieves, and clears invite codes in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/microActions.ts: Generates micro‑action suggestions based on recent mood patterns and context tags.
frontend/src/utils/moodAnalysis.ts: Analyzes mood history to compute distribution, trend, dominant mood, concern level, and guidance.
frontend/src/utils/moodColors.ts: Maps mood categories to Tailwind color and gradient class sets for UI styling.
frontend/src/utils/moodReminder.ts: Handles once‑per‑day mood reminder dismissal using localStorage with date‑based keys.
frontend/src/utils/profileAvatar.ts: Provides helpers to derive avatar URLs, revoke blob URLs, validate avatar uploads, and convert files to Uint8Array.
frontend/src/utils/shareCode.ts: Generates a 6‑character alphanumeric share code using a restricted, non‑ambiguous character set.
frontend/src/utils/soundPreferences.ts: Gets and sets a boolean sound-enabled preference in localStorage with safe fallbacks.
frontend/src/utils/time.ts: Converts between bigint nanosecond timestamps and Date, offers day-boundary helpers, and formats dates for display or input.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Handles reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters across query and hash routing using sessionStorage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, container settings, and plugins including typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current architecture, planned membership-model changes, and known issues across frontend and backend.
